name: Hidden Scenes - Fantasy Forest
description:
Fantasy Forest contains 20 stunning scenes to reveal. Embark on a journey through these fantastic forests, full of beautiful colors and mystical vistas.

Hidden Scenes is a game similar to a jigsaw puzzle where you swap and flip the pieces to reveal the hidden scene. When all pieces are flipped / swapped into their correct location, you win!

**MAJOR UPDATE!**

*New game mode!*
ROTATION - rotate the pieces AND swap them into the correct spot

*More customizable!*
Only like the tiny puzzles? No problem. Love a good challenge and want to play only "Insane" levels? Also no problem!

*BONUS animated level!
Beat all 20 normal levels and get access to a bonus fully animated level!

Six different modes of play:
SWAP - swap the pieces into their correct spot, easy and relaxing
FLIP - swap and flip the pieces into their correct spot, a little more challenging
ROTATE - swap and ROTATE the pieces into their correct spot! Can be very challenging!
RADIAL - swap pieces of a circular puzzle, very unique!
QUICK PLAY - unlimited random puzzles!
CHALLENGE MODE - timed and move counting puzzles!
